verses.roman:
ekhani āsibe saba, āmi yadi phukāri
ghoḍā-piḍā luṭi' labe tomā-sabā māri'

synonyms: ekhani—immediately; āsibe saba—all of them will come; āmi—I; yadi—if; phu-kāri—call loudly; ghoḍā-piḍā—horses and their saddles; luṭi'-plundering; labe—will take; tomā-sabā māri'-after killing all of you.
translation: "If I call loudly, they will come immediately to kill you and plunder your horses and saddles.
